citations.narrative:
Two rabbits are being housed in an enclosure with a chicken. Housing rabbits with other species may affect their
health and well-being and increase their risk of injury.
The facility should ensure the rabbits are not housed in the same primary enclosure with any other species.
To be corrected by 11/10/2014
Location: Wm S Hart LA County Park
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative
Additional Inspectors
Lorang Jeanne, Animal Care Inspector
